title: Only with Your Heart - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Fantasy   Josei   Mature   Romance   Smut
tags: Aristocracy   Beautiful Female Lead   Female Protagonist   Flashbacks   Handsome Male Lead   Lovers Reunited   Medieval   Obsessive Love   Outdoor Interc**rse   Possessive Characters   R-18   R*pe   Schemes And Conspiracies   Summoned Hero   Transported to Another World
author: Izumino Jules   泉野ジュール
description: At a glance, Chizuru Ayase looks like your average fresh-faced employee. However, she held a secret that she couldn’t tell anyone… During her last summer vacation in high school, she had been summoned to another world and became its savior. And in this past, she had fallen in love with its Hero, ‘The Knight of Blaze.’ This is a fantasy romance about unrequited love in a medieval setting.>
